name: Gather any materials
goal: Collect loose or harvestable items efficiently based on surroundings
environment: Use perception to list nearby dropped items, plants, and blocks
Note biome hints (water, trees, animals) to pick best targets

steps.title: Identify targets
steps.details: Scan for dropped items, crops, saplings, and blocks that can be quickly harvested. Share coordinates and prioritize high-value items before they despawn.
checks: Inventory has at least one free slot

steps.title: Collect efficiently
steps.details: Route through items in a small radius, sweeping them up while avoiding hazards. Use appropriate tools when available but do not block on tool quality.

notes: Drop low-value blocks if inventory is full before grabbing rare items.
